about.rabbiTitle: Head of 'Keeil Taarog' institutions in Har Homa, Jerusalem
about.rabbiBio1: Rabbi Eyal Amrami Shlit"a is one of the central and respected figures in the field of spreading faith and strengthening hearts in our generation. Hundreds of lessons given by him every year in Israel and around the world, succeed in touching thousands of Jews from all walks of life, arousing a deep connection to faith, and restoring inner light to life.
about.rabbiBio2: The Rabbi's lessons are characterized by clarity, warmth, a direct and genuine approach, and above all - a rare ability to make the foundations of faith accessible even to those who are far from it. The Rabbi travels from place to place with immense dedication out of one mission: to strengthen every Jew wherever he is in Israel or in the world.
about.spreadingFaith: Spreading Faith ‚Äì the Heart of the Mission
about.spreadingFaithDesc: The lessons of Rabbi Eyal Amrami Shlit"a are a turning point for many. They are intertwined with words of Torah, faith, encouragement and deep insights for life - and are served with a warm, direct and heart-touching approach. The many responses and personal testimonies testify to the depth of the impact: people tell how one word, one lesson, or a look of warmth and truth - changed their lives, strengthened their faith and gave them renewed strength for coping and growth.
about.institutionsSubtitle: A greenhouse for education and bringing hearts together
about.institutionsDesc: Alongside his impressive personal activity, Rabbi Amrami heads a large-scale educational-spiritual system. The 'Keeil Taarog' institutions, which operate in the Har Homa neighborhood of Jerusalem, include:
about.institutionsVision: The institutions operate out of a clear vision: to provide every Jew with a supportive and uplifting environment, which connects education, spirit and faith - with love and respect.
about.addressDetails: Jerusalem, Har Homa, Rabbi Man HaHar St. 4
